page.title: 13WEEKEND FAMILY LIFE IN WALES
page.content: {SATURDAY}On a typical Saturday Dad wakes up about 7.30 am and has breakfast while watching TV. Mum and we children get up next.We watch TV after breakfast.Later we help Dad, while Mum does the washing.Dad fetches fish and chips for lunch.After dinner we go to Grandma's house and play football or cricket all afternoon.We watch TV till it is time to go home. {SUNDAY Some of the family gets up early at 8.30 and some lie in until 9.30. We breakfast whilst watching TV. The children help Dad setting some garden vegetables.Mum irons or dusts in the house,then cooks Sunday dinner,the big meal of the week! Afterwards Dad watches TV news.He goes back into the garden.Mum washes up,we play football. For tea there is salad or meat from lunch. Evening is spent watching TV.
